## Anthropic Models

### Claude 4 Series
- `anthropic/claude-opus-4-5-20251101` - Claude Opus 4.5 (newest, most capable)
- `anthropic/claude-haiku-4-5-20251001` - Claude Haiku 4.5 (newest, fastest) 
- `anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929` - Claude Sonnet 4.5 (newest, balanced)
- `anthropic/claude-opus-4-1-20250805` - Claude Opus 4.1
- `anthropic/claude-opus-4-20250514` - Claude Opus 4 ✅ *used as fallback*
- `anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-20250514` - Claude Sonnet 4 ✅ *current primary*

## OpenAI Models (Selected)

### GPT-5 Series
- `openai/gpt-5` - GPT-5 (latest)
- `openai/gpt-5-2025-08-07` - GPT-5 (dated)
- `openai/gpt-5-pro` - GPT-5 Pro
- `openai/gpt-5-mini` - GPT-5 Mini

### GPT-4 Series
- `openai/gpt-4o` - GPT-4o (latest)
- `openai/gpt-4o-mini` - GPT-4o Mini (cheaper)
- `openai/gpt-4` - GPT-4 (original)

## Cost Optimization Strategy

**Current Setup:**
- **Primary:** Sonnet 4 (~$3/$15 per M tokens)
- **Heartbeats:** Haiku 3.5 (~$0.25/$1.25 per M tokens)
- **Fallback:** Opus 4 (~$15/$75 per M tokens)

**Upgrade Opportunities:**
- Consider newer 4.5 models for better performance
- Haiku 4.5 for even cheaper heartbeats
- Sonnet 4.5 for better primary reasoning

**Usage:**
```bash
# Get latest model names
node fetch-models.mjs
```
